EFI_ACPI_MEMORY_MAPPED_ENHANCED_CONFIGURATION_SPACE_BASE_ADDRESS_ALLOCATION_STRUCTURE Struct Reference


Data Fields

UINT64 BaseAddress
UINT16 PciSegmentGroupNumber
UINT8 StartBusNumber
UINT8 EndBusNumber
UINT32 Reserved

Detailed Description

Memory Mapped Configuration Space Access Table (MCFG) This table is a basic description table header followed by a number of base address allocation structures.
